about1: Hello, I am Bodhisatta Bhattacharjee currently in 6th Semester (as of
about2: ), pursuing my BTech in Computer Science from KIIT University, Bhubaneshwar, Odisha.
about3: I enjoy coding, problem solving and learning new technologies, and I'm looking for opportunities to grow as a software engineer and work on exciting and impactful projects. I aspire to be a Software / Game Developer. I had developed few games in UNITY earlier. Currently I am full heartedly doing Web Development with REACT and also learning Machine Learning on other times. I have made a Full Stack MERN project and determined to make more. This portfolio website of mine is the 2nd REACT project which I will host.

I like playing video games especially competitive FPS games (Counter Strike 2 mainly) and simulation games. I also like to listen to calm and slow music mainly non vocal EDM, POP, JAZZ or in some rare ocassions HEAVY METAL.
